definition: 5-[[(4,7-Dihydroxy-2-oxo-2H-1-benzopyran-3-yl)amino]carbonyl]-4-methyl-1H-pyrrole-3-carboxylate + 3-Amino-4,7-dihydroxycoumarin + ATP + 2 S-Adenosyl-L-methionine <=> Coumermic acid + AMP + Diphosphate + 2 S-Adenosyl-L-homocysteine
comment: multi-step reaction ligase, CouL methyltransferase, CouO
